name: MULTIDIMENTIONAL Trial
description:
OK......

Umm.... I hope you are able to understand our language.... 

Test Subject Hooman_1002, you are here to help us understand your intelligence. We want to test if you are able to understand our, So-Called "Non-Eucledian World". Well if you don't know what it is, well it is something abnormal for you.

We Think You are capable.

Be careful though, you can die sometimes.... Just Sometimes

NOTE:This is a trial version of the game. You may experience some bugs. And the game files were corrupted... So.... Sorry For the Inconvenience.
